mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.name, p.title, p.path, p.icon, p.type, p.component, p.level, p.button_type, p.parent_id, p.sort_order, p.description, p.status, p.url FROM st_admin u LEFT JOIN st_admin_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN st_role_permission rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN st_permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.title, p.path, p.icon, p.type, p.component, p.level, p.button_type, p.parent_id, p.sort_order, p.description, p.status, p.url FROM st_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN st_permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC
